title: Repack Associate
description: Received, unpacked, and stocked merchandise across designated warehouse zones
Operated pump trucks and prepared outbound shipments, including labeling and pallet wrapping
Used RF scanners to track inventory
Provided first-line support for RF scanner syncing issues, barcode mismatches, and device restarts
Assisted in onboarding new hires by demonstrating scanner usage and basic troubleshooting
Collaborated with supervisors and IT staff to log and report recurring scanner or system issues

title: Retail Sales Associate
description: Assisted customers with in-store purchases, product information, and curbside pickups
Maintained visual displays, restocked inventory, and processed transactions via POS systems
Supported customers with order tracking, account access, and login issues
Resolved basic technical queries (e.g., order delays, mobile app errors); escalated complex issues through the internal ticketing system
Ensured store tablets and mobile POS devices were functional and up to date before each shift
